title: Looking Past
description: Ten years ago, Ben Worthington ran away from home after a violent confrontation with his father. Heâ€™s lived with the anger and resentment that confrontation caused ever since.To the outside world, Dylan Barrows has it all together. But he struggles with the guilt from his inability to protect his older brother from his abuser.Tragedy brings them together, and an unknown shared history threatens to tear them apart before they can begin looking past their issues ... and finally find love.
author: Michael     Bailey
